panels.description: Number of GPUs assigned to the job.
panels.title: Assigned GPUs

panels.description: Number of active GPUs (>0%) in the job.
panels.title: Active GPUs

panels.description: Number of active GPUs (>0%) in the job.

targets.expr: (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Idle GPUs

panels.description: Number of NPUs assigned to the job.
panels.title: Assigned NPUs

panels.description: Number of active NPUs (>0%) in the job.
panels.title: Active NPUs

panels.description: Number of active NPUs (>0%) in the job.

targets.expr: (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0)) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Idle NPUs

panels.description: Average GPU utilization across all assigned GPUs in the job.
panels.title: Assigned GPU Utilization

panels.description: Average GPU utilization across all assigned GPUs in the job in the selected time range.
panels.title: Assigned GPU Utilization Over Time

panels.description: Average GPU utilization across all active GPUs (>0%) in the job.
panels.title: Active GPU Utilization

panels.description: Average GPU utilization across all active GPUs (>0%) in the job over the selected time range.
panels.title: Active Utilization Over Time

panels.description: Average NPU utilization across all assigned NPUs in the job.
panels.title: Assigned NPU Utilization

panels.description: Average NPU utilization across all assigned NPUs in the job in the selected time range.
panels.title: Assigned NPU Utilization Over Time

panels.description: Average NPU utilization across all active NPUs (>0%) in the job.
panels.title: Active NPU Utilization

panels.description: Average NPU utilization across all active NPUs (>0%) in the job over the selected time range.
panels.title: Active NPU Utilization Over Time

panels.description: Average NPU memory utilization across all active NPUs (>0%) in the job.

targets.expr: (sum(avg by (uuid) ((task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})) / count( avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: GPU Memory

panels.description: Average NPU memory utilization across all active NPUs (>0%) in the job.

targets.expr: (sum( avg by (uuid) ((task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'} > bool 0) * task_device_mem_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'})) / count( avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: NPU Memory

panels.description: CPU usage per active GPU in the job.

targets.expr: (sum(task_cpu_percent{job_name="$job_name"}) / count( avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0)) / 100) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Memory usage per active GPU in the job.

targets.expr: (sum(task_mem_usage_byte{job_name="$job_name"}) / count( avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Block In Rate per active GPU in the job.

targets.expr: (sum(rate(task_block_in_byte{job_name="$job_name"}[5m])) / count( avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Disk Read

panels.description: Block Out Rate per active GPU in the job.
panels.title: Disk Write

panels.description: Network In Rate per active GPU in the job.

targets.expr: (sum(rate(task_net_in_byte{job_name="$job_name"}[5m])) / count( avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Network In

panels.description: Network Out Rate per active GPU in the job.

targets.expr: (sum(rate(task_net_out_byte{job_name="$job_name"}[5m])) / count( avg by (uuid) (task_device_percent{job_name="$job_name",device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Network Out

panels.description: Device utilization for all GPUs in the job.
panels.title: Device Utilization
